translation: Finding myself authorized by the Superior Commander of the Vanguard Forces Command and safeguarding the points of Três Forquilhas, Rio Verde, and Torres; and considering it my duty to inform Your Excellency, Your Excellency, Your Excellency Torres for better arrangements with Your Excellency, Your Excellency, Your Excellency Ilha de Santo Antônio to fire five shots so that Your Excellency, Your Excellency, Your Excellency José Joaquim Cabeleira, is the one who can best inform Your Excellency.
